After %evolve_attack_count%, the Eidolon evolves into the next level.\n\nLesser Eidolons have %lesser_eidolon_hp% health and %lesser_eidolon_dmg%%% of Enigma's base attack damage.\nEidolons have %eidolon_hp% health and %eidolon_dmg%%% of Enigma's base attack damage.\nGreater Eidolons have %greater_eidolon_hp% health and %greater_eidolon_dmg%%% of Enigma's base attack damage.\nDire Eidolons have %dire_eidolon_hp% health and %dire_eidolon_dmg%%% of Enigma's base attack damage.\n\nEidolons live for %duration% seconds and their lifetime is refreshed upon evolving."

		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_health_stone"               													"Health Stone"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_health_stone_Description"               										"This item can be dragged onto an existing item with empty slots to improve them.\nCan be dragged multiple times into the same slot, increasing the stats provided diminishingly. The amount you will get upon dragging another stone of this type into the slot is the amount for that level of this item.\nWhen dragged onto an item without empty slots, it will replace the stone in the slot you drag it to; returning a single use of this item to your inventory.\nItems of a higher tier will improve the stats of this stone."
		"DOTA_Tooltip_ability_item_health_stone_Note0"															"All stones will be put into the selected slot while holding Control\nStones can be removed by clicking the slot while holding Alt."
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_health_stone_Lore"															"A mysterious crystal capable of improving endurance."
		"DOTA_Tooltip_Ability_item_health_stone_health"															"+$health"

		"DOTA_Tooltip_relic_boiling_blood"																		"Boiling Blood"
		"DOTA_Tooltip_relic_boiling_blood_Description"															"As long as you are near enemies, you will take 2%% of your current health per second as magic damage.\nYou deal 2%% of your maximum health as damage to all nearby enemies.\nSelf-damage is not lethal.\nDamage dealt is not based on damage taken."

		"DOTA_Tooltip_relic_mysterious_stone_Description"														"You lose 50%% status resistance (if you drop below 0%%, debuff durations are increased), but you prevent block one debuff every 12 seconds."

		"DOTA_Tooltip_relic_red_key_Description"																"Losing 50%% max health."

		"DOTA_Tooltip_relic_crystal_skull_Description"															"You are permanently invisible as long as there are no enemies within 450 radius.\nYour armor and magic resistance will be set to at least 0.\nThis overrides other forms of invisibility."

Damage is non-lethal."
